Steve Lopez: 'I can't deal with life sober': Response to the MacArthur Park drug epidemic just isn't enough](/steve-lopez-i-cant-deal-with-life-sober-response-to-the-macarthur-park-drug-epidemic/article_9af85d7e-97dc-5d2e-b322-59f964fb3b8d.html)
LOS ANGELES â€” He was bent at the waist, wobbly and shoeless on grimy pavement at the end of an alley where fires smolder, drug users gather day and night, and death lurks. Slowly, he made his way across the parking lot behind the Yoshinoya restaurant at Wilshire Boulevard and Alvarado Street. It was not a normal gait, but in MacArthur Park, you see it every day. The head hangs low. The eyes ...
